question: Shaheen VIII is the joint military exercise between Pakistan & which country?
explanation: The 8th edition of joint military exercise titled Shaheen VIII has started  between the air forces of China and Pakistan in Chinese city of Holton,  which is closer to the Indian border near Ladakh. The purpose of the exercise is to improve training standards of the two air forces through mutual learning. It comes at a time when the country\'s relations with Pakistan have hit rock-bottom. The air to air war games is said to be an exercise to develop a mechanism for interoperability of both countries\' air forces.  The Indian Air Force (IAF) is keeping a close eye on the Pakistan-China aerial exercise in which both the countries have deployed latest fighter jets.
